abnormal_interpretation.low: Thrombocytopenia (dengue, viral fever, bone marrow issues)

abnormal_interpretation.high: Liver disease, warfarin therapy, vitamin K deficiency
Kidney dysfunction, dehydration, high protein intake

normal_range: Normal size and echotexture of organs

abnormal_interpretation.high: Bleeding risk, liver disease, anticoagulant use

abnormal_interpretation.low: Dengue, viral fever, bone marrow suppression

normal_range: Age-dependent values for AFP, hCG, Estriol
AFP, hCG, Estriol, Inhibin A within age limits

abnormal_interpretation.findings: Ascites due to cirrhosis, TB, malignancy

abnormal_interpretation.low: Growth retardation, immunity issues, skin disorders

abnormal_interpretation.high: Lead poisoning – anemia, neuropathy, GI upset
Arsenic poisoning – GI distress, skin pigmentation
